descriptionsByVersion.v1.5:
RealDeathless - Even the brain is destroyed
Added a new archite gene to the game, real deathless.
Features: - Restore missing parts every 60000 ticks (1 day). - Cure injures and wounds every 60000 ticks (1 day). - Resurrect from death like collapsed rocks (only player). - Pawn's HP will not lower than 5% (only player, optional).
Localization: - English - Simplified Chinese
Compatibility: - Good compatibility in theory.
Credits: - Brrainz's Lib.Harmony
